languages.text: На их призывы восстать против зла, плодящегося в протекторате фон Валанциус, отвечали тысячи праведных, но благородные властители оставались глухи к проповедям.
Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.
languages.original_text: На их призывы восстать против зла, плодящегося в протекторате фон Валанциус, отвечали тысячи праведных, но благородные властители оставались глухи к проповедям.

traits.locale_text: Their calls to rally against the evil that breeds in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.
Their calls to rally against the evil that breeds in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.
Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.
Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.
Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.
Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.

languages.text: 他们号召民众联合起来，反对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的邪恶力量，得到了成千上万的正义人士的响应，但贵族当局却对他们的说教充耳不闻。
languages.original_text: Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.

traits.locale_text: 他们号召民众联合起来，反对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的邪恶力量，得到了成千上万的正义人士的响应，但贵族当局却对他们的说教充耳不闻。

languages.text: Auf ihre Aufforderung, sich gegen das Böse zu stellen, das im Protektorat von Valancius heranwuchs, folgten Tausende von Rechtschaffenen, doch bei den adligen Behörden stießen ihre Predigten auf taube Ohren.
languages.original_text: Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.

traits.locale_text: Auf ihre Aufforderung, sich gegen das Böse zu stellen, das im Protektorat von Valancius heranwuchs, folgten Tausende von Rechtschaffenen, doch bei den adligen Behörden stießen ihre Predigten auf taube Ohren.

languages.text: Des milliers de vertueux répondirent à son appel et se rassemblèrent pour lutter contre le mal qui se répandait à travers le protectorat von Valancius, mais les nobles autorités restèrent sourdes à leurs sermons.
languages.original_text: Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.

traits.locale_text: Des milliers de vertueux répondirent à son appel et se rassemblèrent pour lutter contre le mal qui se répandait à travers le protectorat von Valancius, mais les nobles autorités restèrent sourdes à leurs sermons.

languages.text: Miles de justos escucharon sus llamadas a unirse contra el mal que se gestaba en el protectorado von Valancius, pero las autoridades nobles hicieron oídos sordos a sus sermones.
languages.original_text: Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.

traits.locale_text: Miles de justos escucharon sus llamadas a unirse contra el mal que se gestaba en el protectorado von Valancius, pero las autoridades nobles hicieron oídos sordos a sus sermones.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領で蔓延している悪に対抗するべく集まろうという呼びかけには正義に燃える数千もの人々が応えたが、高貴な権力者たちは彼らの説教に耳を貸さなかった。
languages.original_text: Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領で蔓延している悪に対抗するべく集まろうという呼びかけには正義に燃える数千もの人々が応えたが、高貴な権力者たちは彼らの説教に耳を貸さなかった。

languages.text: Von Valancius protektorasında mevcudiyetini sürdüren kötülüğe karşı mücadele çağrılarına binlerce dindar yanıt verirken soylu yetkililer, bu söylevlere kulak tıkadı.
languages.original_text: Their calls to rally against the evil breeding in the von Valancius protectorate were answered by thousands of the righteous, but noble authorities were deaf to their sermons.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius protektorasında mevcudiyetini sürdüren kötülüğe karşı mücadele çağrılarına binlerce dindar yanıt verdi ancak soylu yetkililerin kulakları bu söylevlere karşı tıkalı kaldı.
